statement.sql: SELECT ContactId FROM Contact (nolock) WHERE new_cpf_sem_mascara =? or itbc_CPFouCNPJ =?
SELECT ContactId FROM Contact (nolock) WHERE emailaddress1 =?

New_PortalTreinamento, Contact.New_Ramal_Comercial2 AS New_Ramal_Comercial2, Contact.New_Ramal_fax AS New_Ramal_fax, Contact.New_ramal_telefone AS New_ramal_telefone, Contact.New_RG AS New_RG, Contact.New_saldo_pontos_fidelidade AS New_saldo_pontos_fidelidade, Contact.New_Sequencia AS New_Sequencia, Contact.New_status_integracao AS New_status_integracao, Contact.New_total_pontos_resgatados AS New_total_pontos_resgatados, Contact.new_lojaid AS new_lojaid, Contact.new_lista_marketingid AS new_lista_marketingid, Contact.new_cidadeid AS new_cidadeid, Contact.new_paisid AS new_paisid, Contact.new_regionalid AS new_regionalid, Contact.new_ufid AS new_ufid, Contact.itbc_areaatuacaotexto AS itbc_areaatuacaotexto, Contact.itbc_AreadeAtuacao AS itbc_AreadeAtuacao, Contact.itbc_DescricaodaAreadeAtuacao AS itbc_DescricaodaAreadeAtuacao, Contact.itbc_descricaodopapelnocanal AS itbc_descricaodopapelnocanal, Contact.itbc_integrabarramento AS itbc_integrabarramento, Contact.itbc_acesso AS itbc_acesso, Contact.itbc_imei AS itbc_imei, Contact.itbc_observacao AS itbc_observacao, Contact.itbc_acesso_app_isol AS itbc_acesso_app_isol, Contact.itbc_codigo_funcional AS itbc_codigo_funcional, Contact.itbc_treinamento AS itbc_treinamento, Contact.itbc_CodigoFuncional AS itbc_CodigoFuncional, Contact.itbc_acesso_solar AS itbc_acesso_solar, Contact.itbc_canais_de_venda AS itbc_canais_de_venda, Contact.itbc_exibir_site AS itbc_exibir_site, CASE WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Gestor%' THEN 'Gestor' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Básico%' THEN 'Básico' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Operacional%' THEN 'Operacional' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Operacional Benefícios%' THEN 'Operacional Benefícios' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Atacado Distribuidor%' THEN 'Atacado Distribuidor' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Especializada Incêndio%' THEN 'Especializada Incêndio' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Especializada Incêndio%' THEN 'Especializada Incêndio' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Integrador%' THEN 'Integrador' WHEN itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_name LIKE '%Provedores%' THEN 'Provedores' END AS itbc_name_acesso_extranet, replace (replace (replace (Account.itbc_CPFouCNPJ, '.', ''), '/', ''), '-', '')AS CPFouCNPJ_Conta, Account.itbc_classificacaoidname AS Classificacao_Conta FROM Contact (nolock) INNER JOIN Account (nolock) ON Contact.AccountId = Account.AccountId INNER JOIN itbc_acessosextranetcontatos (nolock) ON .itbc_acessosextranetcontatos.itbc_contactid = Contact.ContactId INNER JOIN itbc_acessoextranet on (itbc_acessosextranetcontatos.itbc_acessoextranetid = itbc_acessoextranet.itbc_acessoextranetid) WHERE Contact.new_cpf_sem_mascara =? or Contact.itbc_CPFouCNPJ =?

JOIN Account (nolock) ON Contact.AccountId = Account.AccountId WHERE Contact.emailaddress1 =?
